General.Name: PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk
General.Description: PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk develops, constructs, operates, manages, and maintains toll roads in Indonesia. The company also offers road construction and maintenance services. It also rents toll road equipment and vehicles; holds toll road concessions; develops and constructs real estate properties, including residential, office building, and apartment; and manages rest areas. As of December 31, 2022, the company operated 9 toll roads. PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Plaza Tol Taman Mini Indonesia Indah, Jakarta, Indonesia, 13550
